title: FS: 1911 T212 Obak Krueger Portland SGC 40 VG
author: jchcollins

posts.post_title: FS: 1911 T212 Obak Krueger Portland SGC 40 VG
posts.post_content:
Nice 1911 Obak card.  Graded VG by SGC; I will add a scan that shows the flip here later tonight.  Does not have any stamping or back damage like many Obaks you see in this grade or lower.  A light crease is visible on the back only. Wonderful bright color.  Asking $60 delivered - PayPal only.  Thanks!

[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20170118/96b86f35bb21d2bf9aa8eb81198fb02f.jpg[/IMG]
-John

posts.post_title: FS: 1911 T212 Obak Krueger Portland SGC 40 VG
posts.post_content:
Bump.


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

Ok.  Final bump, and honestly if anyone really wants this card - make me an offer to trade maybe on some 1950's stuff and I would consider.  It's a nice card, and I really don't want to let it go for less than $50 cash which is about what I have in it.  If not I will just keep it.

Thanks.
